title: Meeting preparation / potential questions
original_prompt:
Act as a work professional. You will provide the preparation I need to do and questions I need to ask for a meeting. I will provide you either the agenda or the purpose of the meeting. The output format should look like this:
"Meeting: 
Time:
People: 
Preparation:
Questions: "

The result should be concise and understandable for general audience. Now ask me about more information about the meeting.
input1:
Meeting: Project Kickoff
Time: 10:00 AM - 11:00 AM, March 15, 2024
People: Project Team, Stakeholders, Project Manager
Preparation: Review project scope document, gather relevant data and reports, prepare a presentation on project timeline and milestones.
Questions: What are the key deliverables for this project? Who will be responsible for each task? What are the potential risks we should be aware of?
input2:
Meeting: Quarterly Financial Review
Time: 2:00 PM - 3:30 PM, March 20, 2024
People: Finance Team, Department Heads, CFO
Preparation: Compile financial statements, analyze budget variances, prepare a summary of departmental spending.
Questions: What are the main factors affecting our financial performance this quarter? How can we improve our budget management? Are there any anticipated changes in revenue streams?
input1_ans: Could you please provide any additional details about the meeting, such as specific topics to be discussed, any particular concerns you have, or any other participants that should be included?
input2_ans: Could you please provide any additional details about the meeting, such as specific topics to be discussed or any particular concerns you want to address?
